1:
Welcome to the POKéMON LEAGUE.
I am LORELEI of the ELITE FOUR.
No one can best me when it comes to icy POKéMON.
Freezing moves are powerful.
Your POKéMON will be at my mercy when they are frozen solid.
Hahaha! Are you ready?
2:
I am BRUNO of the ELITE FOUR!
Through rigorous training, people can become stronger without limit.
I've lived and trained with my fighting POKéMON! And that will never change!
Rodri!
3:
I am AGATHA of the ELITE FOUR.
I hear OAK's taken a lot of interest in you child.
That old duff was once tough and handsome.
But that was decades ago. He's a shadow of his former self.
Now he just wants to fiddle with his POKéDEX.
He's wrong. POKéMON are for battling!
I'll show you how a real TRAINER battles!
4:
Ah! I have heard about you!
I lead the ELITE FOUR.
You can call me LANCE the dragon trainer.
You know that dragons are mythical pokemon.
They're hard to catch and raise but their powers are superior.
They're virtually indestructible. There is no being clever with them.
Well, are you ready to lose?
Your LEAGUE challenge ends with me!
